of the NFT recipient if successful purchase. This should be zero if no recipient is indicated"}},"onERC1155BatchReceived(address,address,uint256[],uint256[],bytes)":{"details":"Handles the receipt of a multiple ERC1155 token types. This function is called at the end of a `safeBatchTransferFrom` after the balances have been updated. NOTE: To accept the transfer(s), this must return `bytes4(keccak256(\"onERC1155BatchReceived(address,address,uint256[],uint256[],bytes)\"))` (i.e. 0xbc197c81, or its own function selector).","params":{"data":"Additional data with no specified format","from":"The address which previously owned the token","ids":"An array containing ids of each token being transferred (order and length must match values array)","operator":"The address which initiated the batch transfer (i.e. msg.sender)","values":"An array containing amounts of each token being transferred (order and length must match ids array)"},"returns":{"_0":"`bytes4(keccak256(\"onERC1155BatchReceived(address,address,uint256[],uint256[],bytes)\"))` if transfer is allowed"}},"onERC1155Received(address,address,uint256,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Handles the receipt of a single ERC1155 token type. This function is called at the end of a `safeTransferFrom` after the balance has been updated. NOTE: To accept the transfer, this must return `bytes4(keccak256(\"onERC1155Received(address,address,uint256,uint256,bytes)\"))` (i.e. 0xf23a6e61, or its own function selector).","params":{"data":"Additional data with no specified format","from":"The address which previously owned the token","id":"The ID of the token being transferred","operator":"The address which initiated the transfer (i.e. msg.sender)","value":"The amount of tokens being transferred"},"returns":{"_0":"`bytes4(keccak256(\"onERC1155Received(address,address,uint256,uint256,bytes)\"))` if transfer is allowed"}},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"supportsInterface(bytes4)":{"details":"See {IERC165-supportsInterface}."},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner."},"updateBuyNowPrice(uint256,uint128)":{"details":"Buy-now price cannot be updated for declining-price saleIf buy-now price is met by the highest bid, the sale is immediately terminated, and the highest bid is automatically taken"},"updateWhitelistedBuyer(uint256,address)":{"details":"Cannot update whitelisted buyer if a bid has been made"},"withdrawAllCredits()":{"details":"Withdraw all credited value from marketplace and set the credit variable to zero"},"withdrawAuction(uint256)":{"details":"Marketplace owner can use this function to withdraw an auction, which has been for too long without interactionWithdraw NFTs from marketplace, withdraw all bids from the auction, then delete the auction"},"withdrawBid(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Withdrawer must pay the gas to repick the highest bidderIf everybody has withdrawn their bid, ``numBids`` is set to zeroWithdrawn cash will be credited to the marketplace"}},"title":"An Auction Contract for bidding and selling single and batched NFTs","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"auctionToBid(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"autionId --> bidId --> Bid"},"createDecliningPriceSale(address,uint256[],uint256[],uint128,uint128,uint128)":{"notice":"Create fixed-price sale"},"createNftAuction(address,uint256[],uint256[],uint128,uint128,uint32)":{"notice":"Create an auction using custom bid increase percentage & custom auction bid period"},"createSale(address,uint256[],uint256[],uint128,address)":{"notice":"Create fixed-price sale"},"defaultBidIncreasePercentage()":{"notice":"Default values that are used if not specified by the NFT seller"},"erc20TokenForAuction()":{"notice":"ERC20 token used for timed-auction payment"},"ethCredits(address)":{"notice":"Failed transfer ETHs"},"idToAuction(uint256)":{"notice":"auctionId --> Auction"},"isTrustedNftContract(address)":{"notice":"nftContractAddress --> isApproved"},"makeBid(uint256,address,uint128,bool)":{"notice":"Make offer"},"marketplaceWallet()":{"notice":"Fees need to be paid for successful purchase"},"settleAuction(uint256,uint256,bool)":{"notice":"The seller can settle an auction after termination to take a bid and delete the auction"},"stopAuction(uint256)":{"notice":"For marketplace owner to stop an outdated auction"},"takeOffer(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"The NFT seller can take offer and terminate an ongoing fixed-price sale"},"tokenCredits(address)":{"notice":"Failed transfer tokens"},"updateBuyNowPrice(uint256,uint128)":{"notice":"The seller can update buy-now price"},"updateMinimumPrice(uint256,uint128)":{"notice":"The seller can update reserve price for timed auction"},"updateWhitelistedBuyer(uint256,address)":{"notice":"The seller can update whitelisted buyer for a fixed-price sale"},"withdrawAllCredits()":{"notice":"Withdraw credited value or ERC20 tokens from marketplace"},"withdrawAuction(uint256)":{"notice":"The seller can prematurely close an auction, or withdraw an ended auction without taking offer"},"withdrawBid(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Withdraw bid and pay money back"}},"notice":"This contract can be used for auctioning any NFTs, and accepts any ERC20 token as documentation.text:
@title An Auction Contract for bidding and selling single and batched NFTs
 @notice This contract can be used for auctioning any NFTs, and accepts any ERC20 token as payment
@notice auctionId --> Auction
@notice autionId --> bidId --> Bid
@notice nftContractAddress --> isApproved
@notice Failed transfer ETHs
@notice Failed transfer tokens
@notice Default values that are used if not specified by the NFT seller
@notice Fees need to be paid for successful purchase
@notice ERC20 token used for timed-auction payment
@notice Check if nftContractAddress is trusted or not
@notice Check if msg.sender has enough NFTs for sale
@notice The minimum price must be less than the buyNowPrice (if set)

typeDescriptions.typeString: mapping(uint256 => mapping(uint256 => struct Marketplace.Bid storage ref))
mapping(uint256 => mapping(uint256 => struct Marketplace.Bid storage ref))

documentation.text: @notice If the buy now price is set by the seller, check that the highest bid meets that price.

documentation.text: @notice Check if payment type is matched
@notice Returns the percentage of the total bid (used to calculate fee payments)

mapping(uint256 => mapping(uint256 => struct Marketplace.Bid storage ref))

documentation.text: @notice The default value for the NFT recipient is the highest bidder
@notice Transfer NFTs, without minting, to auction contract, to create an auction
@notice Withdraw NFTs from auction contract, to terminate an auction without selling NFTs

documentation.text:
@notice Transfer NFT and pay seller
 @dev Pay marketplace fee and seller fee, lazily mint unavailable NFTs, transfer them to seller, delete the chosen bid, withdraw all other bids, then delete the auction
@notice Lazily mint unavailable NFTs and transfer them to buyer
@notice For marketplace owner to stop an outdated auction
@notice The seller can settle an auction after termination to take a bid and delete the auction

@notice The seller can update reserve price for timed auction

documentation.text: @notice The NFT seller can take offer and terminate an ongoing fixed-price sale

@notice Withdraw credited value or ERC20 tokens from marketplace
 @dev Withdraw all credited value from marketplace and set the credit variable to zero

@notice Withdraw credited value or ERC20 tokens from marketplace
 @dev Withdraw all credited value from marketplace and set the credit variable to zero

params._nftRecipient: Address of the NFT recipient if successful purchase. This should be zero if no recipient is indicated

onERC1155BatchReceived(address,address,u.details: Handles the receipt of a multiple ERC1155 token types. This function is called at the end of a `safeBatchTransferFrom` after the balances have been updated. NOTE: To accept the transfer(s), this must return `bytes4(keccak256("onERC1155BatchReceived(address,address,uint256[],uint256[],bytes)"))` (i.e. 0xbc197c81, or its own function selector).

params.data: Additional data with no specified format
params.from: The address which previously owned the token
params.ids: An array containing ids of each token being transferred (order and length must match values array)
params.operator: The address which initiated the batch transfer (i.e. msg.sender)
params.values: An array containing amounts of each token being transferred (order and length must match ids array)

onERC1155Received(address,address,uint25.details: Handles the receipt of a single ERC1155 token type. This function is called at the end of a `safeTransferFrom` after the balance has been updated. NOTE: To accept the transfer, this must return `bytes4(keccak256("onERC1155Received(address,address,uint256,uint256,bytes)"))` (i.e. 0xf23a6e61, or its own function selector).

params.data: Additional data with no specified format
params.from: The address which previously owned the token
params.id: The ID of the token being transferred
params.operator: The address which initiated the transfer (i.e. msg.sender)
params.value: The amount of tokens being transferred

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateBuyNowPrice(uint256,uint128).details: Buy-now price cannot be updated for declining-price saleIf buy-now price is met by the highest bid, the sale is immediately terminated, and the highest bid is automatically taken

updateWhitelistedBuyer(uint256,address).details: Cannot update whitelisted buyer if a bid has been made

withdrawAllCredits().details: Withdraw all credited value from marketplace and set the credit variable to zero

withdrawAuction(uint256).details: Marketplace owner can use this function to withdraw an auction, which has been for too long without interactionWithdraw NFTs from marketplace, withdraw all bids from the auction, then delete the auction

withdrawBid(uint256,uint256).details: Withdrawer must pay the gas to repick the highest bidderIf everybody has withdrawn their bid, ``numBids`` is set to zeroWithdrawn cash will be credited to the marketplace

devdoc.title: An Auction Contract for bidding and selling single and batched NFTs

createNftAuction(address,uint256[],uint2.notice: Create an auction using custom bid increase percentage & custom auction bid period

defaultBidIncreasePercentage().notice: Default values that are used if not specified by the NFT seller

erc20TokenForAuction().notice: ERC20 token used for timed-auction payment

marketplaceWallet().notice: Fees need to be paid for successful purchase

settleAuction(uint256,uint256,bool).notice: The seller can settle an auction after termination to take a bid and delete the auction

stopAuction(uint256).notice: For marketplace owner to stop an outdated auction

takeOffer(uint256,uint256).notice: The NFT seller can take offer and terminate an ongoing fixed-price sale

updateBuyNowPrice(uint256,uint128).notice: The seller can update buy-now price

updateMinimumPrice(uint256,uint128).notice: The seller can update reserve price for timed auction

updateWhitelistedBuyer(uint256,address).notice: The seller can update whitelisted buyer for a fixed-price sale

withdrawAllCredits().notice: Withdraw credited value or ERC20 tokens from marketplace

withdrawAuction(uint256).notice: The seller can prematurely close an auction, or withdraw an ended auction without taking offer

withdrawBid(uint256,uint256).notice: Withdraw bid and pay money back

userdoc.notice: This contract can be used for auctioning any NFTs, and accepts any ERC20 token as payment
